Articles.Content:
Kerbal 1: Night time again, huh.

Kerbal 2: Time flies by fast.

Kerbal 1: Any planned launches?

Kerbal 2: No, not right now, currently.

Kerbal 1: Then what are those red lights on the ground above the launch pad?

Kerbal 2: It looks like... THE SPACE KRAKEN!!!!

Kerbal 1: Two things. One, do you know the difference between the Kraken and his younger brother, The Space Kalmari? Two, OH MY JEB! ITS THE SPACE KALMARI!!

Kerbal 2: I think its flying to the VAB!

Kerbal 1: What would it want there, is there any craft on the VAB?

Kerbal 2: Well, there is the VTOL...

Kerbal 3: Help! Something is pulling my craft up!

Kerbal 1: ITS TAKING THE VTOL!!!

Kerbal 2: You come back with that VTOL!

Kerbal 1: The Space Kalmari just disappeared with the Vtol...

Kerbal 2: What if it took the VTOL to eat it, or took it to... Fully revive the Kraken?

Kerbal 1: Who was the pilot?

Kerbal 2: Lemberry Kerman, he isn't a very experienced pilot.

Kerbal 1: Phew, good thing it wasn't Jeb.

Kerbal 2: 6 Arms... Flying... Say, Rayrim, name 6 sub-categories of planes and rockets.

Kerbal 1/Rayrim: VTOL, Seaplane, SSTO, Lander, Satellite, and Space Station.

Kerbal 2: AH!

Rayrim: Whats wrong, Malwell?

Kerbal 2/Malwell: What if, to fully revive the Kraken, the Kalmari needs to bring these 6 vehicles in that order to the Kraken's body on Bop?

Rayrim: I think you are being a bit paranoid.

Malwell: Either that, or you listed the Kalmari's lunch menu.

Edited October 31, 2014 by KotDemopan
